$jsonSchema.title: Global overview of the war, it's planets, capitals etc

_id.description: The identifier for this war, taken directly from the API

start_date.description: When this war season was started

end_date.description: When this war season is scheduled to end

planets.description: All planets present in this war season

_id.description: The index of this planet, for convenience kept the same as in the official API

name.description: The human readable name of the planet, or unknown if it's not a known name

disabled.description: Whether or not this planet is currently playable (enabled)

initial_owner.description: Which faction originally claimed this planet

max_health.description: Maximum health of this planet, used in conflict states

position.description: The coordinates in the galaxy where this planet is located

sector.description: The name of the sector this planet resides in (or the identifier as a string if it's not a known sector)

waypoints.description: Waypoints, seems to link planets together but purpose unclear

history.description: Planet status change over time during a war

_id.description: Time at which this status was retrieved from the API

liberation.description: The progression of liberation on this planet, presented as a %

owner.description: The faction that owns the planet at this moment

players.description: The amount of helldivers currently on this planet

regen_per_second.description: At which rate this planet will regenerate it's health
